CheckTitle: Log monitoring and alerts are set up for VPC network route changes
Description: It is recommended that a metric filter and alarm be established for VPC network route changes.
Risk: Monitoring changes to route tables will help ensure that all VPC traffic flows through an expected path.

Recommendation.Text: Logon to SLS Console. Ensure the Action Trail are Enabled. Select Alerts. Ensure alert rule has been enabled for VPC network route changes.
